name: Lost Sigil
description:
An exploration spell casting game. Decipher what your spellbook means to learn the lost sigil arts... and kill some spooky baddies.

Controls:

Staff Motion Controller:

Hold touchpad up + Move controller = Move teleport ghost

Hold Trigger = Draw sigil for spell casting. Press trigger again to cast.

Press touchpad down = Control lantern summon. Press Trigger while controlling to go idle. Press touchpad down again while controlling to unsummon.

Book Motion Controller:

Press touchpad up = Summon necronomicon

Trigger + motion = Turn page
